title: Baseline Assessment
description: Captures demographic information and baseline assessments

field_groups.label: Highest level of education achieved

enum_options.label: Some high school but did not graduate

field_groups.label: Marital status
Please indicate whether the participant smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their lifetime.
Please indicate whether the participant is a current smoker.
Age participant started smoking cigarettes
Age participant stopped smoking cigarettes
During their time as a smoker, please indicate if the participant stopped smoking for a month or more.
Number of months where the participant stopped smoking.
field_groups.help_text: If the participant stopped smoking several times please enter the total of all the months when they didn't smoke.

field_groups.label: Please indicate how many cigarettes per day did the participant smoke on average for the majority of their time as a smoker.

During the last 12 months, how often did the participant have any kind of drink containing alcohol? Count as one drink a 12 ounce can or glass of beer, a 5 ounce glass of wine, or a drink containing 1 shot of liquor.

enum_options.label: Participant has never drank any alcohol in their life
Participant did not drink in the past 12 months, but did drink in the past

field_groups.label: During the last 12 months, how many drinks did the participant have on days when they drank alcohol?

enum_options.label: Less than one drink per day

field_groups.label: Please confirm whether the participant has a personal history of invasive or hematologic malignancy.
field_groups.help_text: This does not include non-melanoma skin cancers such as basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma.

field_groups.label: Please provide the type of cancer, age at which it was diagnosed, and the month and year treatment was completed for each cancer the participant was diagnosed with.

enum_options.label: Lymphoid leukemia (including CLL, Hairy cell leukemia, B-ALL, T-ALL)
Head and Neck (including oral cavity, pharynx, larynx, nasal cavity, major salivary glands)

field_groups.label: Please confirm if the participant has a history of any myeloproliferative disorders.
Please provide the type of myeloproliferative disorder, age at which it was diagnosed, and the month and year treatment was completed for each disorder the participant was diagnosed with.

Please indicate whether you know the cancer history of your biological (blood) relatives. You might not if you were adopted or lost contact with your biological relatives. If you know some, but not all of this information, please choose Yes.
Please select all of the following relatives that have had a history of cancer (check all that apply).
Amongst the relatives with a history of cancer, have any of them had a history of lung cancer?
Please select all relatives that have had a history of lung cancer (check all that apply).
field_groups.help_text: This includes half-siblings (e.g., stepbrother or stepsister)

field_groups.label: Please confirm whether the participant has had any cancer screening in the past
Please check all the cancer types for which the participant has had screening.
Select the most recent breast cancer screening type the participant underwent.
Specify other breast cancer screening type
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this breast cancer screening was completed.
Select the most recent colon cancer screening type the participant underwent.
Specify other colon cancer screening type
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this colon cancer screening was completed.
Select the most recent lung cancer screening type the participant underwent.
Specify other lung cancer screening type
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this lung cancer screening was completed.
Select the most recent cervical cancer screening type the participant underwent.

enum_options.label: Pap smear and HPV testing combined

field_groups.label: Specify other cervical cancer screening type
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this cervical cancer screening was completed.
Select the most recent prostate cancer screening type the participant underwent.
Specify other prostate cancer screening type
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this prostate cancer screening was completed.
Select the most recent liver cancer screening type the participant underwent.

enum_options.label: Liver ultrasound with alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) blood test

field_groups.label: Specify other liver cancer screening type the participant underwent
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this liver cancer screening was completed.
Please provide the most recent other cancer screening type the participant underwent.
Please provide the most recent date (month and year) this other cancer screening was completed.
Please confirm if a doctor has ever told the participant that they have any of the following health conditions.
field_groups.help_text: By hypertension, we also mean high blood pressure. By diabetes, we mean type I or type II diabetes but do not mean pre-diabetes, borderline diabetes or pregnancy-related diabetes. By a depressive disorder, we mean depression, major depression, dysthymia, or minor depression. By heart disease, we mean angina, coronary heart disease, or myocardial infarction.

enum_options.label: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, (C.O.P.D)., emphysema or chronic bronchitis

field_groups.label: Please indicate whether the participant has taken a cytotoxic medication (i.e. cisplatin, methotrexate, or other chemotherapeutic agents) or a demethylating agent (i.e. azacitidine, decitabine) in the past year.
Please confirm whether the participant has a genetic cancer predisposition, hereditary cancer syndrome, or meets criteria for germline testing based on NCCN guidelines.
field_groups.help_text: A participant meets this criteria if they have been recommended for genetic testing by a physician, or referred from a high risk clinic.

field_groups.label: Please indicate whether the participant has had hereditary cancer genetic testing.
field_groups.help_text: We are interested in whether a medical professional has referred the participant for genetic testing, most likely because of a family history of cancer. Hereditary means passed through generations. Please do not include consumer genetic testing for ancestry (for example 23 And Me or ancestry.com) or any previous genetic testing of tumor tissue.

field_groups.label: Please indicate whether the participant has been tested for Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer.
field_groups.help_text: BRCA1 and BRCA2 are genes associated with breast and ovarian cancers. We are interested in whether a medical professional has referred the participant for this genetic testing. Please do not include consumer genetic testing for ancestry (for example 23 And Me or ancestry.com) or any previous genetic testing of tumor tissue.

field_groups.label: Results of the Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer testing (eg BRCA1 or BRCA2 testing)
field_groups.help_text: No mutation identified means the results of the participant's testing were negative, no genetic changes that cause increased cancer risk were found. Mutation identified means a specific change in the gene was identified that causes an increased risk of cancer. If the participant had a "variant of uncertain clinical significance" result please choose "Other result identified not described above."

enum_options.label: Other result identified not described above

field_groups.label: Specify other results of Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer testing
Please indicate whether the participant has been tested for Hereditary Colorectal Cancer (Lynch Syndrome or Polyposis Conditions).
Results of the Hereditary Colorectal Cancer testing
field_groups.help_text: No mutation identified means the results of the participant's testing were negative, no genetic changes that cause increased cancer risk were found. Mutation identified means a specific change in the gene was identified that causes an increased risk of cancer. If the participant recalls the specific gene that had a mutation identified please select this from the answer choices. If the response is a "variant of uncertain clinical significance" result please choose "Other result identified not described above."

enum_options.label: Other result identified not described above

field_groups.label: Specify other results of Hereditary Colorectal Cancer testing
Please indicate whether the participant has had any other genetic testing.
Results of other genetic testing
field_groups.help_text: No mutation identified means the results of the participant's testing were negative, no genetic changes that cause increased cancer risk were found. Mutation identified means a specific change in the gene was identified that causes an increased risk of cancer. If the participant recalls the specific gene that had a mutation identified please select this from the answer choices. If the response is a "variant of uncertain clinical significance" result please choose "Other result identified not described above."

enum_options.label: Other result identified not described above

field_groups.label: Specify other results of genetic testing
